trans-unit.source: In this section, we create a <token>vs_current_short</token> solution that contains two <token>af_integration</token> projects, <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration_PurchaseOrder</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration_Invoice</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In this section, we create a <token>vs_current_short</token> solution that contains two <token>af_integration</token> projects, <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration_PurchaseOrder</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration_Invoice</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration_PurchaseOrder</embeddedLabel> project receives purchase order messages from the customer, converts them to X12 850 purchase order message and routes it to the <embeddedLabel>purchaseorder</embeddedLabel> blob container.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration_PurchaseOrder</embeddedLabel> project receives purchase order messages from the customer, converts them to X12 850 purchase order message and routes it to the <embeddedLabel>purchaseorder</embeddedLabel> blob container.

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration_Invoice</embeddedLabel> project receives X12 810 invoice messages from Fourth Coffee, converts them to the invoice message schema expected by Contoso, Ltd.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration_Invoice</embeddedLabel> project receives X12 810 invoice messages from Fourth Coffee, converts them to the invoice message schema expected by Contoso, Ltd.

trans-unit.source: and routes it to the <embeddedLabel>invoice</embeddedLabel> blob container.
trans-unit.target: and routes it to the <embeddedLabel>invoice</embeddedLabel> blob container.

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the sample <token>af_integration</token> project instead, you can download it from the MSDN code gallery at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390148</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390148</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: If you want to use the sample <token>af_integration</token> project instead, you can download it from the MSDN code gallery at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390148</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390148</linkUri></externalLink>.
